content:
# NCERT Prompt Engineering Project

This project is part of a Prompt Engineering and Automation Task to extract structured educational data from Class 8 NCERT Science chapters using AI tools such as Google Gemini and Python.

## Objective
- Extract content from NCERT Science textbook chapters.
- Store in JSON & Excel.
- Generate a study planner.

## Files
- prompt_extraction.py
- chapter-extract.json
- science-output.xlsx
- study-planner.pdf
- README.md
